author: Natasha Patel
title: 9 Ways Kanika Kapoor Is One Of The Hottest Bollywood Moms
text:
Natasha Patel Mar . 31 . 2017 
While most of the world cannot get enough of Kanika Kapoor â€˜s soulful sound, the fashion team at the MissMalini HQs canâ€™t stop refreshing her Instagram feed for the coolest looks. Being a momma of three hasnâ€™t stopped Kanikaâ€™s IG from being filled with style that any fashionista would lust after. From street fashion to high-end luxury items, to even the basics of pairing, Ms Kapoorâ€™s fashion proves that she is one of the stylish Bollywood mommas we take inspiration from! 1.
